title: Chinese Hinghwa (1912) Genesis
description: Chinese Hinghwa translation of the Bible published in 1912 by the American Bible Society. The Hingwa Romanized text of the Chinese language, also called Puxian is one of the world’s most popular phoneticizations of Chinese.

language.name: Pu-Xian Chinese
language.area: East central Fujian Province, Putian and Xianyou counties. Also in Malaysia (Peninsular), Singapore.
